channel.title: Field Logs on Data From The Field - geospatial data science, machine learning engineering from the field, usually off-road
channel.description: Recent content in Field Logs on Data From The Field - geospatial data science, machine learning engineering from the field, usually off-road

item.title: Polaris RideCommand GPX data to RXR Rider Data Dashboard
item.description:
Looking to do more with your GPX files? check out infographic visualizations below.

Kepler.GL, cubetrek & GPX Viewer are all great resources for interacting with your GPX data. I have loads of merged GPX tracks, movement & trip analytics and rad visualizations of my RZR riding this year. Sure, I am a Data Scientist & MLOps Engineer with a focus on geospatial analytics - but perhaps others are interested as well.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.description:
This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

Headings

Headings from h2 through h6 are constructed with a # for each level:

## h2 Heading
### h3 Heading
#### h4 Heading
##### h5 Heading
###### h6 Heading

The HTML looks like this:

<h2>h2 Heading</h2>
<h3>h3 Heading</h3>
<h4>h4 Heading</h4>
<h5>h5 Heading</h5>
<h6>h6 Heading</h6>

Comments

Comments should be HTML compatible.

<!-- This is a comment -->

Comment below should NOT be seen:

item.title: My AI/ML Tech Stack, best of 2024 tools
item.description:
often asked about my current LLM stack, so posting my 2024, top MLops app list below.

Tool Use Notes
Big-AGI Multi-model LLM Chat app with Beam, Fuse and
engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default.
ext extension to be used for dest files.

Big-AGI

for comparing (beaming) and merging responses to same prompt.

http://big-agi.com / @enricoros (https://x.com/enricoros)
